system.requirements:
.Servitor Comrade: Pugnis-Class Combat Servitor
Apt: None
system.descriptionText: Pugnis-Class Combat Servitor Primary Function. Servitor Comrade in Cohesion gives Characte +5 to Weapon Skill Tests and +2 to Melee Attack Damage for the end of the turn. If Controlling Multiple of this Servitor Type, gain an additional +5 to Weapon Skill Tests and +1 to Melee Attack Damage per additional Pugnis-Class Combat Servitor in Cohesion.

description.value: Pugnis-Class Combat Servitor Primary Function. Servitor Comrade in Cohesion gives Characte +5 to Weapon Skill Tests and +2 to Melee Attack Damage for the end of the turn.
